messages.subject: Re: New space for Radical Unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: Looks cool.  There s also a new site created by an unschooling dad I know and he describes it as a site like Myspace but for unschoolers :-) So instead of
messages.messageBody:
Looks cool. There's also a new site created by an unschooling dad I
know and he describes it as

"a site like Myspace but for unschoolers :-) So instead
of being part of Yahoo or Ning, it's by unschoolers, for
unschoolers. Free profiles, blogs, groups, meetups, and
calendars for now, and in the future I'm looking to add
areas for people to advertise services and stuff. How cool
would it be to be able to support other unschoolers?

http://www.unschoold.com

Arp

ps registering gets rid of the ads ;-)"

Jules

--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "Ren Allen"
<starsuncloud@...> wrote:
>
> I just wanted to pass this along...
>
> My friend Laura (yes, I live near some really cool peeps) just started
> a new forum for radical unschoolers: http://familyrun.ning.com/
>
> It's really neat! Kinda like myspace, with ways to connect with
> friends and places for discussions. I might close the new lilaguide
> list and ask everyone to go over there. It's really cool.
>
> Ren
> learninginfreedom.com
>

messages.subject: New space for Radical Unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: I just wanted to pass this along... My friend Laura (yes, I live near some really cool peeps) just started a new forum for radical unschoolers:
messages.messageBody:
I just wanted to pass this along...

My friend Laura (yes, I live near some really cool peeps) just started
a new forum for radical unschoolers: http://familyrun.ning.com/

It's really neat! Kinda like myspace, with ways to connect with
friends and places for discussions. I might close the new lilaguide
list and ask everyone to go over there. It's really cool.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
